channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: アップルのサービス担当上級副社長エディ・キューは、いかにしてスポーツのライブストリーミングへの参入を主導し、MLSとの契約を利用してスポーツの消費方法の再構築を試みているのか（Sam Schube/GQ）
item.description:
Sam Schube / GQ:
How Apple SVP of Services Eddy Cue led the company's push into live sports streaming and is using its MLS deal to test reshaping how sports are consumed  —  Longtime Apple executive Eddy Cue happens to be an enormous sports fan.  And with Apple entering the wild west of broadcasting live sports …

item.title: アマゾン、2024年の早い時期にプライム・ビデオに限定広告を導入予定、米国では広告なし層は月額2.99ドル追加（Jake Rudnitsky/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Jake Rudnitsky / Bloomberg:
Amazon plans to introduce limited ads in Prime Video in the US, the UK, Germany, and Canada early in 2024; ad-free tier will cost $2.99/month extra in the US  —  Prime will also include an ad-free option for an additional $2.99 per month in the US, while pricing in other countries will be published later …

item.title: スタジオCEOは9月21日にもWGAとの交渉セッションに出席、WGA交渉委員会は9月22日に交渉を再開すると発表（Wendy Lee/Los Angeles Times）
item.description:
Wendy Lee / Los Angeles Times:
Studio CEOs attended another bargaining session with the WGA on September 21; WGA negotiating committee says talks will resume on September 22  —  Jobs, Labor & Workplace  —  The Writers Guild of America and major studios  —  held a marathon bargaining session Thursday …

item.title: WGAとのマラソン交渉でCEOが遅くまで残る（Gene Maddaus/Variety）
item.description:
Gene Maddaus / Variety:
CEOs Stay Late in Marathon Bargaining Session With WGA  —  Four Hollywood CEOs returned to the bargaining table Thursday for a second day of talks with the Writers Guild of America, as the industry looked for signs of progress toward a deal that would end the 143-day strike.

item.title: 父親ほどあからさまに政治的でなく、訴訟を乗り越えてフォックスを率い、Tubiの買収など実績もあるラクラン・マードックのプロフィール（ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙）
item.description:
New York Times:
A profile of Lachlan Murdoch, who is less overtly political than his father, has led Fox through lawsuits, and has some proven successes, including buying Tubi  —  He solidified his rise to the top of his father's media empire on Thursday.  —  Lachlan Murdoch's path to succession has been rocky at times …

item.title: マイケル・ウルフ著『The Fall』より抜粋：第1章では、ルパート・マードックの死亡記事を想像し、フォックス社とニューズ社における彼の人生とキャリアを描いている（マイケル・ウルフ／The Ankler）。
item.description:
Michael Wolff / The Ankler:
Excerpt from Michael Wolff's The Fall: the first chapter imagines an eventual Rupert Murdoch obituary, capturing his life and career at Fox Corp and News Corp  —  The mogul's ‘obituary’ opens the buzzy upcoming book, ‘The End: The Fall of Fox News and the Murdoch Dynasty’

item.title: WBDは、英ハートフォードシャー州にあるワーナー・ブラザース・スタジオ・リーヴスデンの拡張工事を発表、10のサウンドステージを2024年初頭から開始し、2027年に終了する（Tom Ambrose/The Guardian）
item.description:
Tom Ambrose / The Guardian:
WBD announces an expansion of Warner Bros Studios Leavesden, in Hertfordshire, UK, with work to add 10 sound stages starting in early 2024 and finishing in 2027  —  Studios behind Harry Potter films to undergo 400,000 sq ft expansion by 2027, in boost to struggling industry

item.title: アマゾンは、ここ数カ月の間にAIが作成した疑いのある書籍が大量に出品されたことを受け、著者のウェブサイトでの自費出版を1日3冊に制限している（Ella Creamer/The Guardian）。
item.description:
Ella Creamer / The Guardian:
Amazon limits authors to self-publishing three books per day on its website, after an influx of suspected AI-generated material listed for sale in recent months  —  The company announced the new limitations after an influx of suspected AI-generated material was listed for sale but said that ‘very few’ publishers will be affected

item.title: ルパート・マードックの会社所有の仕組みは、ラクランの昇格が必ずしも一族帝国の支配権争いの終結を意味しない（マシュー・ガラハン/フィナンシャル・タイムズ紙）
item.description:
Matthew Garrahan / Financial Times:
The way Rupert Murdoch structured the ownership of his companies doesn't necessarily mean Lachlan's ascension ends the fight for control of the family empire  —  The way outgoing patriarch Rupert has structured ownership of his assets means the story is not yet over

item.title: AIツールは、大規模なデータファイルのクエリ、潜在的な記事に関するアラート、コンテンツのパーソナライズなどのタスクで、記者、報道機関、読者を支援することができる（Louise Story）。
item.description:
Louise Story:
AI tools can help reporters, news outlets, and readers with tasks such as querying large data files, alerting about potential stories, and personalizing content  —  Today, understanding artificial intelligence is an essential skill for a media leader.  This is not simply because you need …

item.title: 欧州の出版社60社の割引購読戦略を見てみよう。消費者に定期的な読書習慣をつけるため、出版社はより長いトライアルを試みている（Aisha Majid/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Aisha Majid / Press Gazette:
A look at the discounted subscription strategies at 60 publishers in Europe, as publishers try longer trials to build regular reading habits among consumers  —  Consumers have come to expect discounted trials and introductory offers when signing up to news brands.

item.title: クリストファー・ベハがハーパーズ誌編集長を辞任、2018年にシニアエディターとしてハーパーズに加わったクリストファー・キャロルが9月25日付で編集長に就任する（Max Tani/@maxwelltani）
item.description:
Max Tani / @maxwelltani:
Christopher Beha resigns as editor of Harper's Magazine; Christopher Carroll, who joined Harper's as senior editor in 2018, will become editor on September 25  —  Inbox: Christopher Beha Resigns from Harper's Magazine; Christopher Carroll Appointed Editor [image]

item.title: スナップによると、Snapchat+の加入者数は2023年4月の3Mから5M以上に増加、月額3.99ドルの層は広告収入の業界減速後、2022年6月に開始（Alex Barinka/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Alex Barinka / Bloomberg:
Snap says Snapchat+ now has 5M+ subscribers, up from 3M in April 2023; the $3.99 per month tier launched in June 2022, after an industry slowdown in ad revenue  —  Snap Inc. has gained more than 5 million subscribers for its paid service, an offering that gives users early access to new features …

item.title: YouTube、クリエイターが動画を編集し、エフェクトやGIF、ロイヤリティフリーのトラックなどを追加できるアプリ「YouTube Create」を8市場のAndroidでベータ公開（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
YouTube debuts YouTube Create, an app that lets creators edit videos, adding effects, GIFs, royalty-free tracks, and more, in beta on Android in eight markets  —  YouTube this morning introduced a new app for creators, YouTube Create, that will offer a suite of easy-to-use and free tools …

item.title: YouTube、2024年登場の「YouTube Studio」AI機能を発表、AIが他言語の吹き替えを作成する「Aloud」を一部のクリエイターにテストさせる（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
YouTube unveils YouTube Studio AI features coming in 2024 and lets select creators test Aloud, a dubbing tool that creates AI-generated dubs in other languages  —  YouTube is expanding its Creator Music Studio, announced last year, with new AI features in addition to the launch of an AI-dubbing tool.
